botpasswords-summary: Bɔt paswɛdi Ŋmɛɛ nɔtsɛ akauntu gbɛ kɛtsɔ API lɛ be mli ni okɛ akauntu lɛ lɔgin nibii lɛ tsuuu nii. Onine nyɛŋ ashɛ nɔtsɛ hegbɛ lɛ fɛɛ nɔ kɛji olɔɔgin kɛ bɔt paswɛdi lɛ. Kɛji ole nɔ hewɔ ni otaoɔ ofeee lɛ, no lɛ, esaaa akɛ ofeɔ. Esaaa akɛ mɔ ko biɔ bo akɛ ofee nibii nɛɛ ateaŋ eko koni okɛhã lɛ.
botpasswords-no-central-id: Dani okɛ bɔt paswɛdi lɛ baatsu nii lɛ no lɛ, esa akɛ olɔgin yɛ akauntu krɛdɛɛ ko nɔ.
botpasswords-editexisting: Tsakemɔ bɔt paswɛdi ni yɔɔ momo
botpasswords-label-needsreset: (esa akɛ asaa afee paswɛdi lɛ ekoŋŋ)
botpasswords-help-grants: Gbɛŋmɛɛ hãa hegbɛ ni nifeelɔgbɛi lɛ yɔɔ momo. Gbɛŋmɛɛ yɛ biɛ hãaa bo hegbɛ akɛ onɔtsɛ akauntu lɛ naŋ. Kwɛmɔ [[Special:ListGrants|gbɛŋmɛɛ okpɔlɔ lɛ]] kɛna he nilee babaoo. Gbɛŋmɛɛ ni yɔɔ gbeyei lɛ akadi. Gbɛŋmɛɛ ni akadiko lɛ ewa akɛ abaagu kɛ mɔ ko bote bɔt lɛ mli kɛ yiŋtoo fɔŋ. Gbɛŋmɛɛ ni nifitemɔ gbeyei yɔɔ mli. ({{int:grantriskgroup-vandalism}}) Abaanyɛ ni akɛfɔlɔ naji ni ebiɔ nifeemɔ babaoo kɛtsumɔ. Gbɛŋmɛɛ ni akɛ hebuu gbeyei ({{int:grantriskgroup-security}}) can cause lasting harm (such as theft of private data). Internal grants ({{int:grantriskgroup-internal}}) yɔɔ mli lɛ, mɛi titri ni kɛtsuɔ nii ji plama lɛ kudɔlɔi. ofainɛ kaabi gbɛŋmɛɛ ni yɔɔ gbeyei bɛja ehe miihiaa bo waa.
botpasswords-toolong-restrictions: IP adrɛsii lɛ fa tsɔ loo anyɛmɔ nibii fe nine
botpasswords-insert-failed: Anyɛɛɛ akɛ bɔt gbɛi afata he "$1". Aso akɛfata he momo?
botpasswords-update-failed: Bɔt gbɛi lɛ nyɛɛɛ ni eye emuu "$1". Agbe lo?
botpasswords-created-body: Bɔt paswɛdi lɛ kɛhã bɔt gbɛi "$1" kɛhã {{GENDER:$2|user}} "$2" agbele.
botpasswords-updated-body: Bɔt paswɛdi lɛ kɛhã bɔt gbɛi "$1" kɛhã {{GENDER:$2|nifeelɔ}} "$2" ahã eye emuu
botpasswords-deleted-body: Bɔt paswɛdi lɛ kɛhã bɔt gbɛi "$1" kɛhã {{GENDER:$2|user}} "$2" ahã eye emuu
botpasswords-newpassword:
Paswɛdi hee ni sa akɛ akɛbote akauntu lɛ mli $1 ji $2. Ofainɛ ŋmaa enɛ kɛŋmɛ shi kɛhã wɔsɛɛ ko.
(kɛji tsutsu bɔt lɛ biɔ akɛ lɔgin gbɛi lɛ kɛ nifeelɔgbɛi lɛ ahi ŋlɛ nɔ lɛ, obaanyɛ ni okɛ $3 nifeelɔgbɛi kɛ $4 akɛ paswɛdi.)
botpasswords-no-provider: Bɔt paswɛdi yelikɛbuamɔ nifeemɔ lɛ bɛ amrɔnɛɛ.
botpasswords-restriction-failed: Bɔt paswɛdi gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ eŋmɛɛɛ gbɛ ni oboteɔ akauntu lɛ mli.
botpasswords-invalid-name: Nifeelɔgbɛi ni atsɔɔ lɛ bɛ bɔt paswɛdi mligbalalɔ ("$1").
botpasswords-needs-reset: Bɔt paswɛdi kɛhã bɔt gbɛi "$2" of {{GENDER:$1|user}} "$1" esa akɛ asaa afee.
botpasswords-locked: Onyɛŋ ni okɛ bɔt paswɛdi alɔgin be mli ni alɔɔki akauntu lɛ.
